00035 int main(void)
00036 {
00037    std::cout << std::endl
00038              << "Purple: An Open Source Numerical Optimization C++ Library." 
00039              << std::endl
00040              << "De Jong Function Application." << std::endl;
00041 
00042 
00043    srand( (unsigned)time( NULL ) );

00045    RastriginFunction rastriginFunction;
00046 
00047    int numberOfVariables = 5;
00048 
00049    rastriginFunction.setNumberOfVariables(numberOfVariables);
00050    
00051    Vector<double> argument(numberOfVariables, 1.0);
00052   
00053    // Evaluation
00054   
00055    double evaluation = rastriginFunction.getEvaluation(argument);
00056    
00057    std::cout << std::endl
00058              << "Evaluation:" << std::endl
00059              << evaluation << std::endl;
00060              
00061    // Analytical Gradient vector
00062 
00063    Vector<double> analyticalGradient = rastriginFunction.getGradient(argument);
00064    
00065    std::cout << std::endl
00066              << "Analytical gradient:" << std::endl;
00067              
00068    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00069    {
00070       std::cout << analyticalGradient[i] << " ";         
00071    }
00072 
00073    std::cout << std::endl;
00074 
00075    // Analytical Hessian matrix
00076 
00077    Matrix<double> hessian = rastriginFunction.getHessian(argument);
00078    
00079    std::cout << std::endl
00080              << "Hessian:" << std::endl;
00081              
00082    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00083    {
00084       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfVariables; j++)
00085       {
00086          std::cout << hessian[i][j] << " ";         
00087       }
00088       
00089       std::cout << std::endl;
00090    }
00091 
00092    // Inverse Hessian matrix
00093 
00094    Matrix<double> inverseHessian = rastriginFunction.getInverseHessian(argument);
00095    
00096    std::cout << std::endl
00097              << "Inverse Hessian:" << std::endl;
00098              
00099    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00100    {
00101       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfVariables; j++)
00102       {
00103          std::cout << inverseHessian[i][j] << " ";         
00104       }
00105       
00106       std::cout << std::endl;
00107    }
00108 
00109    std::cout << std::endl;
